Classes in zeus.agents used by Default Package
ZeusExternal
          This class provides a means to connect an agent to an application specific external interface, (it is typically used to connect GUI front-ends to the agent, but they do not need to be graphical in nature).
 

Classes in zeus.agents used by zeus.actors
BasicAgent
          This class implements the shared agent functionality common to every agent created with the Zeus toolkit.
BasicAgentUI
          This is the interface that is implemented by the AgentViewer
ZeusExternal
          This class provides a means to connect an agent to an application specific external interface, (it is typically used to connect GUI front-ends to the agent, but they do not need to be graphical in nature).
 

Classes in zeus.agents used by zeus.actors.event
BasicAgent
          This class implements the shared agent functionality common to every agent created with the Zeus toolkit.
 

Classes in zeus.agents used by zeus.agents
BasicAgent
          This class implements the shared agent functionality common to every agent created with the Zeus toolkit.
BasicAgentUI
          This is the interface that is implemented by the AgentViewer
DbProxy
          The implementation of the Zeus Database Proxy agent, which provides Visualiser agents with a means of persistently storing agent session information.
FIPA_Services
          FIPA_AMS_Services is used by the ACC agent to wrap the Nameserver so that it can be accessed exernally.
PersistentStore
           This abstract class provides an interface to storage platforms so that messaging data (i.e. communication sessions among agents) may be stored for future playback and manipulation.
ZeusExternal
          This class provides a means to connect an agent to an application specific external interface, (it is typically used to connect GUI front-ends to the agent, but they do not need to be graphical in nature).
 

Classes in zeus.agents used by zeus.agentviewer
BasicAgentUI
          This is the interface that is implemented by the AgentViewer

           This abstract class provides an interface to storage platforms so that messaging data (i.e. communication sessions among agents) may be stored for future playback and manipulation.
